synopsis.text:
Yao Jiang embarks on a perilous quest to uncover the truth behind his friend Xiao Yuan's disappearance, leading him to infiltrate an abandoned villa. Trapped by an enigmatic black shadow, Yao narrowly escapes, only to find himself entangled in a series of ominous events. As he delves deeper into the mystery, he uncovers his connection to a figure who 'should not exist.'

The dark world's hidden organization, the shadowy crisis, and the truth behind his friend's disappearance all converge in a grand conspiracy that has been silently unfolding for a millennium. As the battle between good and evil commences, Yao finds himself at the heart of it all.

This anime weaves together suspense, adventure, and inspiration, presenting a tale of self-improvement and positive energy as Yao navigates through the sinister forces that have been manipulating the world's fate from behind the curtains for centuries.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
